commit_list.repo_description: This fork contains the changes we made to vufind for the Spezialized Information Service Performing Arts

A metadata record management system written in PHP, intended to be used in conjunction with VuFind or another Solr-based discovery interface. Provides import, export, harvesting (OAI-PMH), normalization, deduplication and Solr index update functionality with support for multiple metadata formats. Also includes an OAI-PMH provider that can be used to access the data stored in RecordManager database. Functionality driven by simple command line programs for easy automation.

A metadata record management system written in PHP, intended to be used in conjunction with VuFind or another Solr-based discovery interface. Provides import, export, harvesting (OAI-PMH), normalization, deduplication and Solr index update functionality with support for multiple metadata formats. Also includes an OAI-PMH provider that can be used to access the data stored in RecordManager database. Functionality driven by simple command line programs for easy automation.

commit_list.message: Update Finna bootstrapper with upstream changes.
Make sure that combined results view is the first tab.
Verify that scheduled alert is also saved before processing.

[ALLI-3379] Remove unnecessary search id from combined view "more
results" link.
[ALLI-3379] Use hashed search id in URL.
[ALLI-3379] Handle active search filters in combined results view.

Merge pull request #118 from tjhietala/formattranslations

Added some missing translations for formats from NDL-Vufind

Merge pull request #117 from tjhietala/sortlastindexed

Added translations for sort_last_indexed

Merge pull request #116 from tjhietala/boolean

Translated 'Boolean' to Finnish

Merge pull request #115 from tjhietala/registerdetails

Updated the address in register details

Merge pull request #114 from anaukkar/terminology

terminology fixes to MyResearch

[ALLI-3388] [ALLI-3389] Add configuration option for specifying element
link label on touch devices and desktops, part 2.
[ALLI-3388] [ALLI-3389] Add configuration option for specifying element link label on touch devices and desktops.
Escape translated list feed component More-link.
Fix HTML encoding in feed component links.

[ALLI-3388] [ALLI-3389] Wrap link href in single quotes to prevent HTML
encoding issues.

[ALLI-3388] [ALLI-3389] Improvements.

- Make sure that cache file name is updated when feed configuration is changed.
- Add error handling to parsing image element from item content.
- Change extractImage to protected.
- Change typeof(XX) to typeof XX.
[ALLI-3388] [ALLI-3389] Parser and UI component for displaying feeds.

Public list redirect, part 2.

- Simplify building of public list URL.
- Make sure that list exists before attempting to redirect.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:KDK-Alli/NDL-VuFind2 into image-popup-improvements
Redirect anonymous users and list visitors to public list URL.
Fix setting language version based on browser setting.
[ALLI-2505] Verify list visibility before fetching public list notes.
[ALLI-2505] Fix bug in fetching list notes.
[ALLI-2505] Remove unused parameters from image scaling.

[ALLI-2505] Improvements to image popup and scaling of record images.

Image scaling:
- Scale record images everywhere in the UI according to given maximum dimensions.
- Scale record images without a filled background (no longer needed).

Image popup:
- Layout improvements.
- Truncate description field.
- Add option to open image in full size to a new window.
- Add current record and image indices.
- Add time period to Lido records.
- Add public list notes.
- Fix organization name.
[ALLI-3401] Make sure that 'short_open_tags' setting is enabled.
[ALLI-3401] Add logging of failed system calls.
[ALLI-3401] Format display strings for limits using facet settings.
[ALLI-3401] Add templates for Lido and EAD records.
[ALLI-3401] Add functionality for unsubscribing a scheduled alert.

[ALLI-3401] Code review fixes.

- Handle www.finna.fi when determining view paths.
- Use Heredoc in usage info.
- Use proper exit codes.
- System call: quote script name and simplify environment declaration.
- Sort translations.
- Include SQL for database changes.
+ some style and typo fixes.
[ALLI-3401] Console action for sending scheduled alerts.
[ALLI-3323] Add throbber to list visibility change, 2nd try.
[ALLI-3323] Add throbber to list visibility change.

[ALLI-3323] Display spinner while refreshing user lists after adding a
new list.
[ALLI-3323] Fix saving list resource notes to PCI records.
[ALLI-3323] Hide lists dropdown from bulk actions toolbar for non-logged users.
[ALLI-3323] Move counting of user resources to User row object.
[ALLI-3323] Fix total count of user resources.

[ALLI-3323] Improvements to in-place editing.

- Store line breaks as \n in database.
- Warn if user attempts to leave the page while Ajax-requests are in
  progress.
- Make sure that error messages from unsuccessful Ajax-requests get seen
  by scrolling to the top of the page.
- Larger hit-area for add-new-list textfield.
- Fix invalid HTML and indentation.
- Disable editing functions for "All items" list.
[ALLI-3323] Proper sorting of user lists, part 2.

[ALLI-3323] Make sure that only list owner can add an item to a
list. Style fix.
Wrap PCI record URL into an array before forwarding to record image generator.
Wrap PCI record image URL into an array.

Make sure that Finna's record image generator receives an array of
parameters even when VuFind's record driver returns image URL as a string.
[ALLI-3323] Save list description and list resource notes as HTML-formatted.
[ALLI-3323] Check that lists are enabled before Ajax-actions.

[ALLI-3323] Improvements to My favorites screen.

- In-place editable list title, description, visibility and resource
  notes. List description and resource notes may be multi-line.
- New list is added via Ajax.
- Copy to list -function added to bulk actions toolbar. Toolbar is kept
  visible in a fixed position when the window is scrolled.
- result-list templates improved for all record-types.
- PCI records can be viewed using image-popup.
- Lists are sorted by creation date.
Add linebreak to end of file.
Add sample configuration for combined result view.
Configure facets that are collapsed by default.
[ALLI-3234] Load all record image thumbnails using inview-plugin.
[ALLI-3234] Add image count to truncated record image thumbnail navi.

[ALLI-3234] Load record image thumbnails lazily when truncated parent
container is opened.

[ALLI-3348] Bug fix: show results from Primo when the search is started
from Primo/Home.

[ALLI-3324] Restore window scroll position when returning to search
results from a record page.

[ALLI-3205] No need to remove highlighting tags from journal
title in PCI results (highlighting is not used here).

[ALLI-3205] Display journal publication date in PCI results only
when container reference is not available.
[ALLI-3205] Add highlighting to PCI search results summary field.

[ALLI-3205] Add support for multiple PCI checkbox facets using the same facet
field. Display tlevel facet values (online_resources, peer_reviewed) as
checkbox facets.
[ALLI-3205] Add Source collection PCI record field.
[ALLI-3205] Discard empty language entries on PCI record page.

[ALLI-3205] Display external links found from PCI record metadata. Fix
formatting of external links.
[ALLI-3205] Send more parameters to OpenURL resolver.
[ALLI-3205] Add prefix to PCI record identifiers.
[ALLI-3205] Add record driver for PCI records.
[ALLI-3205] Enable next/prev record navigation for PCI record page.
[ALLI-3205] Add back to search button to Solr and PCI record pages.
[ALLI-3219] Allow access to a saved search based on session id.

[ALLI-3219] Handle active facet filters when moving between search
tabs.

- Add current search id to URL parameters when moving to another
  search tab.
- Restore previously active filters when returning to a search tab.
- Modify 'Retain current filters' option to handle filters
  across all search tabs.
[ALLI-3219] Revert to previously used Less variable.
[ALLI-3219] Modify search tabs layout and enabled search types.

Add module for layout related JavaScript. Adjust footer based
on screen height. Override VuFind jumoMenu selector.
[ALLI-2174] Rename Header view helper to Navibar.

Add support for content page heading and placeholders for content pages.
[ALLI-3219] Move Bootstrap .less files under finna theme.

A metadata record management system written in PHP, intended to be used in conjunction with VuFind or another Solr-based discovery interface. Provides import, export, harvesting (OAI-PMH), normalization, deduplication and Solr index update functionality with support for multiple metadata formats. Also includes an OAI-PMH provider that can be used to access the data stored in RecordManager database. Functionality driven by simple command line programs for easy automation.
